message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.SI, cs.SE

This paper discusses security challenges in cyber-physical systems and proposes the use of dynamic Bayesian games for adversarial and defensive cyber deception. The paper focuses on the intersection of computer security (cs.CR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it proposes the use of machine learning techniques for deception. The use of game theory (cs.GT) is also mentioned as a way to model the interactions between attackers and defenders. The paper also discusses the need for system integration (cs.SI) to design up-to-date security mechanisms. Finally, the paper mentions the importance of software engineering (cs.SE) in designing and implementing secure systems.
